column3: You mean that during IBD it doesn't quit with SIGINT within 90sec?
> You mean that during IBD it doesn't quit with SIGINT within 90sec?\n\nYes, it may not. Especially with slow hardware and/or large dbcache (which is often recommended for IBD).
Perhaps the default value should be changed?\n\nWhat would be a reasonable default for `TimeoutStopSec` that can be expected to work also during IBD in the general case?

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16569](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16569.html) (Increase init file stop timeout by setpill)
Maybe the default timestopsec value should be changed in another PR?\nThis could get merged for now.
I don't mean to be aggressive but you're missing a "g" in "aggressive"111
